Articles.Content:
Hi,

Im New Here. I Build a Crawler with Kerbal\_Foundries\_Wheels\_and\_Repulsors\_ALPHA-Beta\_1.8g Mod for the Tracks. I Have Some Pics from it. 

Later Maybe post i the Craft File. 

![screenshot0.png](https://picload.org/image/iiaadlc/screenshot0.png)

![screenshot1.png](https://picload.org/image/iiaadlp/screenshot1.png)

![screenshot6.png](https://picload.org/image/iiaadcg/screenshot6.png)

![screenshot9.png](https://picload.org/image/iiaadcc/screenshot9.png)

![screenshot10.png](https://picload.org/image/iiaadcp/screenshot10.png)

I Hope, you like the Pics and i hope i Post not Double. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MFG

HavockLP

That was a lot of work. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oh, and welcome to the forum.

Thanks. The Crawler have 207 Parts and i build it in 4h. But im not done. But the Rocket can only Manual used. MechJab Think, Stage 0 was not the Last Stage. And befor you can Start the Rocket, You must change the Control to the Rocket. The Craftfile coming soon. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T23:59:14Z" title="07/12/2015 11:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**

If you set up mechjeb with the ascent profile you want and all that but leave activation until later, you could likely activate the autopilot once you've separated the rocket from from rest of the craft and be good to go from there.

I Build on a New Bigger Crawler. 40 Meter Long and 34 Meter Width. That was the Original dimension of the Nasa Crawler.

MFG

HavockLP
Cool crawlers dude!

So my New Crawler i made it with SketchUp and like to Build a Mod for KSP. I Hope you Like that. The first Crawler will i give free in the Next 2 Days. 

But First My New Crawler in a Pic. 

![mynewcrawler.png](https://picload.org/image/iiolrwa/mynewcrawler.png)

And Yes, i life in Germany. Maybe Somebody like to have a Contact with me. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MFG

HavockLP
Keep up the good work Havock!

Have a New Pic of my Crawler. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![mynewcrawler2.png](https://picload.org/image/iiocglw/mynewcrawler2.png)

MFG

HavockLP
Hey im gonna say one thing here if you want to reply to something someone said click "Reply With Quote" at the bottom of there comment. Just saying, not mad BTW just trying to help.

My Crawler is now in KSP work. But not Textured. I Have More Pics for You.

![screenshot14.png](https://picload.org/image/iioiacp/screenshot14.png)

![screenshot17.png](https://picload.org/image/iioiaio/screenshot17.png)

![screenshot18.png](https://picload.org/image/iioiaic/screenshot18.png)

Yes, Jeb was very Small. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MFG

HavockLP

PERFECTION!!! I've been waiting for something like this for a LONG time!
Looks great! I have been wanting something close to this but never could figure out how to design it. May I ask what mod you are using for the track units?

The Tracks are from Kerbal Foundries mod. But i have new Blueprints of this Crawler. Next time have i more Pics. 

MFG

HavockLP
Maybe someone should make a contract pack that uses this mod to move rockets with them.

That is nice Idea. In moment have i Problem with the Model. I hate Blender. Maybe i need Help with it. If one like help me, send me a Mail. [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#9fbaa8ddf0efebf6f0f1baa8db).

I Have new Pics. And its new Crawler Design. The Mod have now 2 Parts. 

![screenshot21.png](https://picload.org/image/iicocic/screenshot21.png)

MFG

HavockLP

I forgot. The Begin of the build of the Tower. 116.32 Meter hight without crane. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![cpt.png](https://picload.org/image/iicloal/cpt.png)

Have Fun,

HavockLP
Nice work HavockLP! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So i build the Crawler Plattform. Its done without Texturing. The Tower is still work and the Crawler self too. 

![cpf.png](https://picload.org/image/ipgpiio/cpf.png)

I hope, you like my work. I think, i can it done in the next 3 Weeks. 

MFG

HavockLP

Those mole tracks are definitely meant for this kind of application. Kerbal Foundries will be releasing a new version soon... not sure what the scale on "soon" is, but it's getting super close. Mostly a code update, but it definitely improves the tracks a lot.
